name: Finn the Fisher: Trash Hunt
description:
This game is very unfinished. I only gave myself 3 days to work on it and ran out of time, but I decided to submit what I have anyways.

At the moment all you can do is swim around and enjoy the graphics I spent too much time on, however I plan on updating this game and adding some actual gameplay eventually.

WASD to move

F11 to toggle fullscreen
